# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of an iron chest entity at position (4.5, -58.5).

### Iron plate smelting at position(4, -60)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- The agent attempted to craft iron chests but failed due to a lack of iron plates. Ensure sufficient iron plates are available before attempting to craft iron chests. Craft iron plates before crafting iron chests.
- The agent should check its inventory and the output of the furnace to ensure that it has enough iron plates before attempting to craft iron chests.

## NAMESPACE
